Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Teachers offer minimal help in a university context. AI is accessible at any time, is mostly helpful, and offers a medium for brainstorming that teachers cannot (or do not have the time) to offer.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: AI has always been much kinder than most university teachers! Most lecturers seem to view students as "just a number" and this feels dehumanising. AI is at least quite kind.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Feedback from AI is always more in-depth. It also allows options to clarify feedback, whereas teachers often view you as wasting their time if you ask for clarification.
